item.title: CFA Level 2: Alternative Investments (part 1)
item.description: Income Property Analysis and Appraisal Capitalization Rate Measuring the Cap Rate Recaptured Depreciation Private Equity Valuation Unique Sources of Value for Private Equity Investments Adjustments for Probability of Failure The Basic Venture Capital Method Investing in Commodities Commodity Futures Returns Commodity prices decline for the following reasons (shifts in demand/supply): Supply and Demand Performance of Hedge Funds Maximum Drawdown Measures left-tail risk Other Risk Measures Hedge Fund Risks Maximum Drawdown Value At Risk Income Property Analysis and Appraisal Capitalization Rate Cap rate = rNOI - gNOI Measuring the Cap Rate Market Extraction Method (ME)
